favourite.article: Oh the blood of Jesus that was shed over 2000 years ago on the cross to redeem me from all slain of the enemy Satan, from day to day, It will never lose its power, it reaches to the highest mountain and flows to the deepest valley, from day to day, it will never lose its powers....

Apart from the cleansing power and forgiveness offered by the blood of Jesus. One night I was praying with a friend the Lord opened his eyes and he saw a demon in a corner of the room as I plead the blood of Jesus the demon vanished. Praise God there is power in the blood. The bible says and they overcame him the devil by the blood of the lamb and the word of their testimony. When the blood is pleaded out of a pure heart as and faith filled heart it protects, dismiss evil presence. Some churches had been deceived by saying where do see the blood? The blood of Jesus is the very life of Christ and so when you plead if you are invoking the life of Christ into manifestations. Wherever there is a manifested presence of Christ Jesus Eden can be found, health is restored peace and security, quietness etc is found thank God for the precious blood of Jesus it's the redeeming blood plead it by faith anywhere anytime anyhow amen
Jesus is my rock and the source of strength. I lean on the Lord during times like this. Amen.
Impossible to comprehend!!!
The precious Blood of Jesus has never lost its power. I am redeemed by the Blood of the Lamb. Thank You Jesus YOU ARE THE KING OF KINGS AND LORD OF LORDS AMEN!
Thank You Lord Jesus for shedding Your Blood for me. This is a timeless song.
A blessing
Thank you for that precious, cleansing blood. There is indeed power in that blood - that crimson flow that makes us white as snow. Where would I be if Jesus didn't love me? Thank You Lord.
Thank God for the cleansing blood it makes us whiter than snow. Praise God.

I love You Lord Jesus! Thank You so much for shedding Thy precious blood on the cross, for me, and for all Thy blood bought people, everywhere. I long for the day when I can stand before You, and thank You, face to face.

Thank You Christ Jesus for Your precious blood that washed away my sin. I have learned of verse Isaiah 1:18 because of this hymn. May I always cling to Your Word, Your promise of life and peace and Your forgiveness of my sin.
Thank You Jesus for the cross and the blood that paid for all my sins that today I stand and have hope for eternal life through Your selfless ultimate sacrifice on calvary.
Beautiful Song! Thank you, I love You Lord Jesus and only Your Blood saved Me, and I love You.

I am completely overwhelmed by the awesome grace of Christ that found me totally unworthy, yet saved me. To Jesus my eternal Lord and Saviour, I pledge my whole being. Nothing else washes sins but the Blood of Christ! I have enjoyed every bit of this gospel music and lyrics. May God bless those who posted this here for our edification.

Thank You Lord for your precious Blood that washes me from all sins as white as snow, cleanses and heals me completely from all sickness of this life on earth. Nothing but the Blood of Jesus, what can make me whole again. Thank you for the words and the author of this beautiful songs that rings in my heart today and forever. I love YOU my LORD and SAVIOUR, JESUS CHRIST.
Praise God! Indeed, how precious is the blood! Thank You Jesus, I love You!
If not for the blood of Jesus Christ that wash away my sin. There will not be hope for me today. Thank You Jesus my Savior Who took away my sin.

Thank You Jesus for the power in Your precious blood. It washes, cleanses and avails for us. Lord Jesus let the power in the blood of Jesus turn our lives around today and forever for good in Jesus Mighty Name. My prayer is that the blood of Jesus will not be in vain in our lives in Jesus Name. Thanks for uploading this song. Have a blessed day. Shalom.
My spirit is lifted. My spirit melts when I remember His crown of thorns and lashes for my save. Thank You Lord for giving Your best for a poor sinner like me.
Can y'all put the Spanish version please

Lord, thank You for all I have and am in the Lord Jesus. There was no other way for me. Thank You for rescuing me. Lord I pray for others who have not accepted Your sacrifice that their eyes will be opened to the truth. In the wonderful name of Jesus, Amen!

'No human effort can wash away our sins; nothing but the precious blood of our Savior. 'No way we can overcome Satan's accusations; nothing but the blood of our Redeemer. 'No way we can present ourselves to God; nothing but the precious blood of Jesus Christ. Yes, He is the way! Oh Lord God, we thank You for Your grace.
Very nice song. Thank you so much God for Saving me and my family. I love You so much Lord Jesus.
What a blessing this morning! Thank You Lord for Your kindness, love and concern over mankind. Thank You for Your only Son, who died on the cross.

What a blessing... I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me. Due to the fall of Adam I had no hope, born under the burden of sin and moral corruption and the penalty of death and God's divine wrath was upon me. Praise the Lord for the precious blood of the Precious Lamb of God...my Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. "Bless the Lord O my soul, and forget not ALL His benefits..."

I've always loved this song, it means so much to a low life sinner like me who is living his 40 years in the desert. A son who was saved, went home at 26 and 7 years later my wife of 36 years files for a divorce. Jesus you are all I have and all I need.
This song blessess mi soooo much I love it.....God bless.
O the blood, only the blood, nothing else. I am who I am because of the blood. Thank You Jesus.
God thank You for sending Your Son to die for a sinner like me.
Lord Jesus, I thank You for Your Blood that is able and mighty to Save.
Oh! Thank You Jesus!
What can wash away my sins, if not the blood of Jesus Christ? Thank You Jesus, You still love me in my stubbornness. I will worship You.

Rev. 12:11 says "And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony....." Father in heaven thank You for giving us victory over Satan through the blood of Your Son Jesus. May we be faithful to You and Jesus till eternity in Jesus name. Amen.

Thank You Heavenly Father for saving me in spite of myself. Thank You for sending Your Son to die in my stead and shed His precious blood for me. Without the shedding of blood there is no remission of sin. Thank You that You have made it possible for me to stand before You in the blood stained robes of righteousness. There is power in the blood; soul cleansing, demon chasing, live giving all conquering power in the blood. Thank You Jesus!
Glory be to God. What a loving Father we have.
Oh, precious is the flow... nothing but the blood of Jesus saves me. "Oh wretched man that I am." Romans 7:24.
The blood of Jesus is the heavenly syrup that terminates all forms of sickness and disease most importantly the remission of sin. Thank You Lord Jesus for shedding Your blood for our justification!
I know no panacea for Sin virus other than the precious blood of the Saviour that cleanses and purifies me. Thanks for a loving Saviour.

Thank You Jesus for the power in Your precious blood. It washes, cleanses and avails for us. My prayer is that the blood of Jesus will not be in vain in our lives in Jesus Name. Thanks for uploading this song. Have a blessed day. Shalom.

I thank God for the blood of Jesus that speaks better than the blood of Abel. It is too big for our human minds to understand what God did for us in Jesus Christ. I will praise and worship Him as long as He grants me breathe in Jesus' name. Amen.
Is a song that always give me inspiration. I pray that the blood of Jesus will not be in vain in our life in Jesus name.
The blood of Jesus can never lose its power. Thank You Jesus!

'For if the blood of bulls and of goats and the ashes of a heifer; sprinkled on the unclean; sanctifies to the purifying of the flesh, how much more shall the blood of Jesus, who through the eternal spirit offered himself without spot to God, purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God' - Hebrew 9:13-14

Awesome song that reminds us of the power of the blood of Jesus, how He has washed me whiter than snow to feel as though I have never sinned. Thank You Jesus for that shedding of that precious blood because I am now clean and drawn to my heavenly Father. Forever grateful!

Thank You Lord for Jesus. What Can Wash Away My Sin? What can pay for my sins way? Nothing BUT THE BLOOD OF JESUS. When we see the colorful landscape of snow. If that is Good what about me made that white. God You are so loving, caring, make me Thine.
The blood of Jesus is precious, He shed for us. Let's appreciate Him by wholeheartedly serve Him.

Precious, it is refreshing to know in all thing that the blood of Jesus settles it for us. He is our righteousness, hope and peace. What a wonderful inheritance, what a love so rich and to obtain is free. Praise The Lord Jesus Christ forever.

This song was sung as we celebrate communion. The blood of Jesus is God's last card against the devil. So much power can be accessed by the blood. Am so privileged to be connected to the Saviour of my soul. Thank You Jesus now and ever.
Jesus puts this song in my heart as I was about to have worship. He reminds me that it is His blood that can wash away my sins.

Glory to God for the forgiveness that comes through the Lamb of God, Jesus Christ our Lord. What wonderful testimonies on this song. I read them in our church this week in CA. Praise Him until we sing together SOON, from every nation, before the throne of the one who gave His life for us!
Thank You oh Jesus Christ for Your forgiveness to all my sins.
The precious blood of the Lamb, shed for me? It's too great! Jesus I love You. Thank You for shedding that blood for me to overcome the enemy.
Amazing song. l have found each word true in my life. The song lifts me up when l feel hopeless. Thank God for the Blood of Jesus.
Impossible to comprehend!!! No filth in anyone's life is beyond the cleansing power of the blood of Jesus!!! Whosever will!!!
The joy of the Lord is my strength, because I am covered with the blood of Jesus.
There is nothing like the blood of Jesus.The blood of Jesus heals, saves, delivers and conquers Satan. The blood of Jesus shall prevail and avail for us. Amen.
Indeed, there is nothing like the blood of Jesus. That's all we have because that's all that God required for a broken relationship to be restored...Hallelujah.
wonderful
Thank You for Your blood, Jesus.

Oh Thank You Lord for your precious Blood. I thank You that I am Blood Bought, Blood Washed and Blood Purified. Your Healing Blood has made me whole. Thank You Lord that I am a Redeemed Woman of God!! I live my life in faith in the Son of God who loved me and gave His Life for me. Oh death where is your victory, where is your sting?
Thank You, Jesus, for this blood.
What a precious blood that washes the heart of men.
God, may Your will be done in my life.
I thank GOD for the blood of His Son JESUS Christ!

Glory to God Almighty for His compassion and His lovingkindness for us. The blood of Jesus is enough for me and is my only hope in this life. I really thank God for His mercy.
Thank you very much for bringing this song up. God bless you.
The last stanza goes: Glory, glory now I sing, Nothing but the blood of Jesus. All my praise to Thee I bring, Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
Gorgeous mp3 of this song! It really touched me. It was already in my worship set for the weekend, this just confirmed that it needs to be there. Thank you for this great resource!

Just a general comment- have searched for a long time for a site like this. with words and music of all our lovely old hymns which seem to be forgotten- even discarded today.
Thank you for all your work in setting this up.

I am the worst sinner/hypocrite! Yet the Lord in His mercy washed me in His blood and made me as white as snow. May I not frustrate this grace. As long as someone is alive don't rule out the work of the blood of Jesus Christ on such a person, just pray for the person.

Inspired from Psalm 51, the Psalm that David wrote and perhaps sang. Overwhelmed by what he had done to Uriah, his wife and the child that God rejected, the David who in his youth stood up to fight for God's Israel, cries out aloud to seek if there was any way this sin (murder of an upright man, adultery, etc) he planned and saw through, if there was any way his sins could be cleansed.
What can wash away my sins? Nothing but the blood of Jesus!!! Halleluja!
